text: hokinesis - Dystonia - Gait disturbance - Hyperreflexia - Limb dysmetria - Mask-like facies - Memory impairment - Mental deterioration - Parkinsonism - Postural instability - Progressive - Psychosis - Rigidity - Tremor - Urinary incontinence - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rou
